org.spf4j.stackmonitor

Class Sampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spf4j.stackmonitor.Sampler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReportGenerator, SamplerMBean

    @ThreadSafe
public final class Sampler
extends Object
implements SamplerMBean
    Utility to sample stack traces. Stack traces can be persisted for later analysis.
    Author:
    zoly
